week2.practice1_html:
What it is

Step-by-step implementation

  1. Create your space: Sit or lie somewhere quiet. No phone, no notifications â€” just five minutes of peace.
  2. Center your breath: Inhale gently through your nose for a count of four, pause one beat, exhale slowly through your mouth for six. Repeat for ten rounds.
  3. Body scan: Move attention from crown to toes. Soften the forehead, unclench the jaw, feel the shoulders drop.
  4. Anchor the calm: Whisper to yourself, â€œIâ€™m safe, my hair is restoring.â€ Notice your breath settle into an easy rhythm.
  5. Optional deepen: On tougher days, play a short guided yoga nidra or breathing app before bed â€” it reinforces the same neural calm.

  • Consistency builds momentum â€” one quiet breath at a time, new strength roots in. ğŸŒ±

week2.practice3_html:
What it is
